short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to share free videos from any website with a curview room.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This feature allows you to watch videos from different websites together with your friends in a curview room.

Just copy a link to the website with the video you want to share and paste it into the input field of a Curview Room.
With the extension installed shared videos are synchronized between the participants in the Curview room.

Just try it out here. >>> www.curview.net
